content: the chart at row 13 for the second sock rather than row 1 circuit socks v1 0 - cow from mars - 2 cuff using a stretchy cast-on of your choice cast on 60 72 84 sts in mc join for working in the round and add a bor marker if you wish i used skeincharmer s fantastic elastic crocheted cast-on https //www ravelry com/projects/skeincharmer/elastic-crocheted-cast-on note for the sample socks in the photo i cast on using cc instead and then introduced mc and knit 1 round before starting the rib next time i will not do this - although it looks cool i didn t like weaving in those extra ends work in 2x2 rib as follows 2x2 rib *k2 p2* repeat from * to * until bor repeat the round above until the cuff measures 1 5 inches or desired length knit 1 round leg introduce cc and start following the chart the chart is repeated 5 6 7 times per round each row of the chart uses one colour only and colours alternate on every row of the chart each row of the chart should be worked twice only odd row are shown in other words round 1 cc work row 1 of the chart 5 6 7 times round 2 cc work row 1 of the chart 5 6 7 times round 3 mc work row 3 of the chart 5 6 7 times round 4 mc work row 3 of the chart 5 6 7 times etc work 2 repeats of the chart or until desired leg length for best results stop after row 2 or 14 but you can stop after finishing any 2 cc rounds heel flap setup switch to mc but do not cut cc we will pick it up again after the heel is done work in pattern as established over the next 31 37 43 sts this corresponds to 2 5 3 3 5 chart repeats + 1 st for symmetry these 31 37 43 sts will be the instep sts adjust your needles as necessary knit across the remaining 29 35 41 sts knit as in knit not according to the chart these stitches will become the heel flap circuit socks v1 0 - cow from mars - 3 heel flap turn so that ws is facing you and work heel flap over 29 35 41 sts using mc only the heel flap is a slipped stitch pattern with a 3-st garter stitch border the garter stitch border creates a nice edge for picking up stitches row 1 ws k3 p23 29 35 k3 turn row 2 rs k3 *sl1 k1* repeat * to * until 4 sts left sl1 k3 turn work these 2 row 18 times or until desired heel flap length heel turn the heel turn begins on a ws row only mc is used row 1 ws sl1 p15 19 23 p2tog p1 turn row 2 rs sl1 k4 6 8 ssk k1 turn row
